name: XR Shiba Inu
description: XR Shiba Inu (XRSHIB) is a lightning fast, zero gas fee ($0.0003) meme token running on ISO 20022 regulatory proof technology. The future of has arrived and only available on the XRP Ledger. XRSHIB's mission is to use bring massive global awareness to the XRP Ledger and save the lives of dogs around the world via charitable donations.
